label: DictionaryDecompounderTokenFilter
description: Decomposes compound words found in many Germanic languages. Implemented using Apache Lucene.

fields.label: Max Subword Size
fields.tooltip: The maximum subword size. Only subwords shorter than this are outputted. Default is 15. Maximum is 300.

fields.label: Min Subword Size
fields.tooltip: The minimum subword size. Only subwords longer than this are outputted. Default is 2. Maximum is 300.

fields.label: Min Word Size
fields.tooltip: The minimum word size. Only words longer than this get processed. Default is 5. Maximum is 300.

fields.label: Only Longest Match
fields.tooltip: A value indicating whether to add only the longest matching subword to the output. Default is false.

fields.label: Word List
fields.tooltip: The list of words to match against.
